title: Questiontype matrix_circle options
description: Description of the options of the Questiontype 'matrix_circle'

left.description: Text left. Include {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties

right.description: Text right. Include {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties

above.description: Text above. Include {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties

below.description: Text below. Include {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties

alignment.description: Choose one from ['horizontal', 'vertical', 'diagonal']. Sets the alignment of matrix. 'diagonal' is default if empty or missing. Include {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties

thirdDimension.description: The name of the third dimension thats shown on the top of the page and is influenced by the circle. Include {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties

circleSize.description: The maximum size/radius of the circle. If empty or missing, the program defaults to 40px. Include {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties
